charaepi_ch0289_00_nemo/2301_1101_0100_2:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] found Nemona and
Pawmot running on the beach...
charaepi_ch0289_00_nemo/2301_1201_0300_1: W-wait up, Pawmot! Let’s take a little break...
charaepi_ch0289_00_nemo/2301_0401_0600_1: Actually, hold on a sec... Let me catch my breath...
charaepi_ch0289_00_nemo/2301_0402_0900_1:
Oh, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! You’re on a
run, too?
charaepi_ch0289_00_nemo/2301_1201_1200_1:
I’ve been running around the beach with
Pawmot today.
charaepi_ch0289_00_nemo/2301_1201_1300_1:
The weather’s nice, too, so instead of going
for a walk, I figured I’d work out instead!
charaepi_ch0289_00_nemo/2301_1201_1400_1:
Pawmot is tough, but I’m not as confident
in my own abilities.
charaepi_ch0289_00_nemo/2301_1201_1500_1:
I need to conquer my weakness in order to get
stronger, and...
charaepi_ch0289_00_nemo/2301_1201_1600_1: if I ever get as fit as Pawmot...
charaepi_ch0289_00_nemo/2301_1201_1700_1:
we could go all over Pasio and have loads
of battles!
charaepi_ch0289_00_nemo/2301_1201_1800_1:
There’ve been many times when Pawmot could
keep battling but I was too exhausted...
charaepi_ch0289_00_nemo/2301_1201_1900_1:
But as I am now, it’s gonna take a while for me
to reach Pawmot’s level...
charaepi_ch0289_00_nemo/2301_1201_2100_1:
You always loved going on runs and walks, even
back in Paldea.
charaepi_ch0289_00_nemo/2301_0401_2300_1:
Yup! I’d just shout “Let’s go!” and let him out of his
Poké Ball!
charaepi_ch0289_00_nemo/2301_0402_2500_1: Yup. Paldea—where I’m from—is so big!
charaepi_ch0289_00_nemo/2301_1201_2600_1:
So maybe he just naturally got stronger and
evolved into Pawmot!
charaepi_ch0289_00_nemo/2301_1201_2700_1:
How he used to be a little Pawmi but kept
growing and growing... It makes me feel so
many emotions.
charaepi_ch0289_00_nemo/2301_1201_2900_1:
After remembering all the battles I had with
Pawmot, I’m feeling pumped!
charaepi_ch0289_00_nemo/2301_1201_3000_1: Ahh! I can’t stay still anymore!
charaepi_ch0289_00_nemo/2301_1201_3100_1:
Talking so long helped me regain some energy,
so let’s battle, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
charaepi_ch0289_00_nemo/2301_1201_3400_1: H-haha... Seems he’s in the mood to run today.
charaepi_ch0289_00_nemo/2301_1201_3500_1:
Oh well. When you’re part of a sync pair, you
gotta prioritize what your partner Pokémon wants!
charaepi_ch0289_00_nemo/2301_0302_3800_1: I guess we can battle another time...
charaepi_ch0289_00_nemo/2301_0402_4000_1: But next time we meet, we’ll definitely battle!
charaepi_ch0289_00_nemo/2301_1201_4200_1:
OK! I’ve gotta give this my all and catch up
with Pawmot!
